title: Shopping List - Lister
summary: “Lister” helps you organizing your purchase - fast, easy and intuitive
description: Don’t forget anything anymoreThanks to the intuitive presentation you’ll always see the progress of your lists. Forgot to buy something? That’s a thing of the past.Save you the tedious typingThanks to the auto completion and the master list, which you create and manage on your own, you can create complete lists in just a few clicks.Organize purchases togetherWith the help of the synchronisation feature you can share your data and lists with anyone and thus create whole Shopping Lists together.Android Wear SupportAs the first shopping list application we’ve added Android Wear Support. Thereby you have all the items you need to purchase right on your wrist - no need to pull out your smartphone every time in the grocery store.What’s also in it:• Customizable Design - customize the appearance of the app the way you like it. Changing the Font, text size & color, the Design and color of the Toolbar is just a fingertip away• Three different list types: Recipes, Shopping Lists, Todo• Multiple automatically sort options• Category-View for even more structure• Shop-Feature for individual prices and sort orders• Price history for every item• Fully automatic synchronisation• Reminders for your purchases• And a lot more!News & ContactGoogle+-Community: http://goo.gl/ry6tGLFacebook: http://goo.gl/bOIUMpWebsite: http://www.beatificbytes.com
descriptionHTML:
Don’t forget anything anymore
Thanks to the intuitive presentation you’ll always see the progress of your lists. Forgot to buy something? That’s a thing of the past.

Save you the tedious typing
Thanks to the auto completion and the master list, which you create and manage on your own, you can create complete lists in just a few clicks.

Organize purchases together
With the help of the synchronisation feature you can share your data and lists with anyone and thus create whole Shopping Lists together.

Android Wear Support
As the first shopping list application we’ve added Android Wear Support. Thereby you have all the items you need to purchase right on your wrist - no need to pull out your smartphone every time in the grocery store.

What’s also in it:
• Customizable Design - customize the appearance of the app the way you like it. Changing the Font, text size & color, the Design and color of the Toolbar is just a fingertip away
• Three different list types: Recipes, Shopping Lists, Todo
• Multiple automatically sort options
• Category-View for even more structure
• Shop-Feature for individual prices and sort orders
• Price history for every item
• Fully automatic synchronisation
• Reminders for your purchases
• And a lot more!


News & Contact
Google+-Community: http://goo.gl/ry6tGL
Facebook: http://goo.gl/bOIUMp
Website: http://www.beatificbytes.com
comments: Last update seems to have done something to this app, now entering a place to All Shops does not show up in Shopping List. Help is too confusing. Have been using this app for years and never had problems till now. Tried for an hour just to enter a shop to no avail, used to be real easy. Cleared cache, also to no avail. App has other issues with Categories and other sections,too. App is now useless to me. LG G2, Android 5.0.2 vers.

Did I read correctly, on the IAP section of the app page, that this apps Pro version costs $329.99?  Update: After using this app for about 10 minutes, I finally realized that it's not for me.  I'll stick with OneNote.

I wish you could choose where the ad's show up - top OR BOTTOM of screen, so you don't click on the wrong list when the ad pops in.   Also it would be great if you could add one more level of sub-categories to lists.   Thank you for considering to my feedback!
A little complex to set up but excellent after that. Find a friendlier way to set up and you easily would deserve 5 stars
Great app but when i activated categories i can't manually sort items, only categories. Why is that?
Great app.  I use it for all my shopping lists.
recentChanges: Google account for sync login will be deprecated. Please migrate to email account
